taskDetails.title: Add findConversationsWithMissingProfiles method to ConversationRepository
taskDetails.description: Add repository method findConversationsWithMissingProfiles(limit: number) to query conversations where participant_username IS NULL for backfill processing

completed: Method queries WHERE participant_username IS NULL
Method accepts limit parameter for batch processing
Method returns array of Conversation domain entities
Interface updated with new method signature

testResults.note: Tests failed due to pre-existing issues in the project (missing dotenv dependency and incorrect test references in message.repository.spec.ts). These issues are not related to the TASK-002 implementation.

notes: Single responsibility: queries conversations with missing profiles
SQL query uses parameterized values to prevent SQL injection
Returns domain entities using existing toDomain mapper
Orders by created_at ASC for backfill processing
Uses LIMIT parameter for batch processing control

implementationNotes: Added findConversationsWithMissingProfiles method to IConversationRepository interface
Query selects conversations WHERE participant_username IS NULL
Orders by created_at ASC to process oldest conversations first
Accepts limit parameter for controlled batch processing
Returns array of Conversation domain entities using existing toDomain mapper
Build completed successfully with no errors
Method signature follows existing repository patterns
